      maxCount = 1
    } else if (arr[i] === max) {
      maxCount++
    }

  }

}

  po sitive  integers thats tartor end wi th 1.
  */
c onst s tartsOneEnds = (n) => {
  let count = 0
  let i = 1
  while (i <= n) {
    let sum = 0
    while (i <= n) {
      sum += i
      i++
    }
    if (sum == n) {
      count++
    }
  }
  return count
}
